transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Yes, Amit sir.
Customer: Ek to mam wo bhejna tha aap bank wale details.
Executive: Accha okay. Ek second ha, mai aapko bhejti hu. Ha mera whatsapp number aapke paas hai I think.
Customer: Aur ek mujhe bolna tha jo aap kal bol rahe the na ki maine aapko phone kiya tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Actually mere ko IndiaMART se ek help chahiye. Mere ko kai bando se actually kal baat hui, unhone hi wo bole ki IndiaMART se hi mil jayega. Aur mai apni taraf se usko bahut search kar chuka hu lekin mere ko item nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Accha okay. Matlab product ki aap baat kar rahe ho?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Actually mam mere ko na jo plain sariya hota hai na misrol wala.
Customer: Plain ha.
Customer: Wo chahiye tha mam.
Executive: Aap mujhe naam batao us product ka exactly.
Customer: Yahi hota hai mam misrol sariya hai plain wala Jaipur ki taraf milta hai jyadatar Jaipur ho gaya.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Jaha pe bhi ye hogi na sariye ki mile.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Waha milega ya to. Isko kuch aur bhi to bolte hai na English me kya bolte hai mere ko yaad nahi aa raha maine.
Customer: Bar bol do mam, plain bar bhi bol dete hai.
Executive: Hmm dekh rahi hu.
Executive: Actually maine ek catalog handle TMT sariya bolte hai na?
Customer: Mam TMT alag hota hai aur plain wala alag hota hai. Do tarah ka product hota hai ye wala.
Executive: Accha aapko plain wala chahiye?
Customer: Haan ji. Mere ko plain wala hi search karna hai actually ye to mere ko mil chuka hai TMT wala to.
Executive: Accha TMT wala mil gaya hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Chaliye mere ko mahine ke andar na mam actually mere production line me mere ko paanch kam se kam paanch ya 10 tan ki requirement hoti hai per month.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur waise to thodi cheez hai lekin isme dhund paau lekin online dhund raha tha to online misrol likhta hu to kai jagah aa bhi jata hai. But agar aap specify se wo karoge to aapko jaldi ho jayega.
Executive: Haan ji mai aapki baat samajh rahi hu. Kis area me aapko dekhna hai ye?
Customer: Ye idhar dekh lo mam Jaipur ho gaya Bhiwani ho gaya is side dekh do.
Executive: Dekho mujhe maine sariya search kiya tha. Pata nahi ab ye meri location le raha hai kya hai mujhe Panipat ka mil raha hai ye.
Customer: Mam yaha pe rate nahi suitable hoga isliye.
Executive: Lag raha hai kya?
Customer: Haan?
Customer: Mil to yaha bhi jayega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Lekin wo yaha pe wo fir rate nahi milenge na hume jo rate hume milte rahega yaha pe mil nahi hai na.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm samajh rahi hu mai aapki baat.
Executive: Aapko dekhna hai yaha pe Haryana me.
Customer: Nahi Jaipur Rajasthan Bhiwani idhar dekho.
Executive: Accha udhar side dekho. Haan waha bata rahe ho na waha pe to banta hi hai.
Customer: Haan waha pe mil jayega.
Executive: Ek second ek second na.
Executive: Jaipur daal ke dekhti hu na. State wise to search nahi hota hai.
Executive: Mujhe to aisa lag raha hai ye sare TMT bars hi aa rahe hai wo TMT hi me wo wale hote hai na thoda sa usme pattern bana hota hai TMT me.
Customer: Haan ji aap plain likh ke dekho na mam plain bar likho aap.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Steel me?
Customer: MS me. Iron. MS.
Customer: Agar aapke paas koi hai aapki party kisi ne agar IndiaMART me registered kar rakha ho to uska number de do.
Executive: Actually mere paas ek company thi par wo South ki company thi aur wo bhi TMT me deal karte the. To wo to mujhe lagta nahi aapke kaam ki hogi.
Executive: Please Jaipur sab cheeze aa rahi hai par mujhe TMT hi mil rahi hai ye mujhe jo aap bata rahe ho na plain bars wo nahi mil rahi.
Executive: Sabka product TMT aa raha hai.
Executive: Kam hoti hai kya wo plain wali demand me?
Customer: Nahi mam bahut jyada hoti hai uske sariya bhatere banate hai mile aisa to nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm ya to.
Executive: Pata nahi hai kuch aur bolte hai inko kyuki milna to chahiye wo bhi mujhe samajh nahi aa raha. Online me search karta hu to mere ko mil jata hai agar mai online hota to abhi aapko dikha bhi deta ya fir mai aapko aadhe paune ghante baad call karunga fir dikha dunga ki ha ye dekho ye cheez hai. Ya to aap ek kaam karna aap ek kaam karna mai batati hu jab aap online ho na ek bari check karna aur mujhe link bhej da. IndiaMART pe dekhe hai aapne ya bahar dekhe hai?
Customer: Mam mai open karta hu to Google pe uske baad wo IndiaMART pe hi open ho jata hai.
Executive: IndiaMART pe hi open ho jata hai. Accha okay.
Executive: Haan mai aapko na jab online aaunga to mai aapko call karunga samne se aap jaise chahe online aa gaye fir dekh lenge jaise bhi aap dekho check kar lena ek baar. Agar aapke knowledge me ho.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Party kahi bhi bhi ho mam bas ye hai ki suitable rate milna chahiye all over India me kahi se bhi mil jaye.
Executive: Samajh gayi. Ek mili hai mujhe company leader company leader level par chalti hai. Ye sabse upar hi hai ji promotion me. New Delhi ki company hai ye. Ye har tarah ke bars me deal karti hai. Inhone likha hua hai dekho.
Executive: 304 stainless steel round bar. Fir ek hexagon bar. Square bar plain hi hai ye sari. Mujhe nahi pata ye kaam wali hai ya nahi. Mai ek bari iske catalog ka link aapko bhej rahi hu. Theek hai whatsapp pe.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Check karna ek baar mujhe batana ye theek hai to theek hai.
Customer: Mai aadhe ghante me karta hu aapka lunch kitne baje 2:00 baje hota hai na mam?
Executive: Lunch mera 2:00 se 3:00 hota hai sir.
Customer: Haan 3:00 baje karunga chalo mai aapko phone aap jab tak ye link bhej do aur wo bank wala bhi bhej do mai wo payment bhi kara deta hu uske baad aapko screenshot bhej deta hu.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Maine aapko bank ka bhej diya hai aap isko please mujhe kara ke bhej do us din matlab mam ne Rina ji ne kaafi force se mushkil se usko hold karwaya hai kyuki wo tha na usi mushkil se.
Customer: Mai aapko bhej dunga uske baad hi call karunga aapko screenshot bhi daal dunga. Saath ke saath aa jayega IMPS kar raha hu.
Executive: Screenshot please daalna aap. Aap mujhe link bhejna so that mai bhi open karke na check kar paau. Theek hai aur ye jo link bheja hai aap ek bari isko dekhna kya pata yahi company aapke kaam ki nikal jaye kyuki badi company hai aur bahut sari cheezo me deal kar rahi hai bahut tarah ki me. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: To ek bari dekhna kaam hota hai to theek hai warna batana aap mere ko. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs plain sariya (rod), not TMT.

- Unable to find plain sariya on IndiaMART.

- Needs 5-10 tons of sariya per month.

- Wants suitable rates from anywhere in India.



Resolution:

- Executive searched for sariya, found Panipat listings.

- Executive shared a catalog link of a Delhi company.

- Executive shared bank details for payment.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the catalog link.

- Customer will make payment and send screenshot.

- Customer will call back after checking the link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- sariya, plain bar, tmt, catalog, payment
